Package io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.extension

Class Craftsman

java.lang.Object
io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.extension.Craftsman
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.Extension, org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.ParameterResolver, org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.TestInstantiationAwareExtension
public class Craftsman extends Object implements org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.ParameterResolver
JUnit 5 ParameterResolver for injecting test data using the @Craft annotation.

This extension dynamically resolves parameters annotated with @Craft, creating instances of the required model based on the provided configuration. The resolved object is retrieved through reflection and stored within the test execution context.

The resolver supports both immediate and lazy instantiation via the Late wrapper. The created objects are injected into the test method at runtime, allowing seamless data provisioning for test cases.

Author:

    • supportsParameter

      public boolean supportsParameter(org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.ParameterContext parameterContext, org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.ExtensionContext extensionContext) throws org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.ParameterResolutionException
      Determines whether the parameter is eligible for resolution by checking for the presence of the @Craft annotation.
      Specified by:
      supportsParameter in interface org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.ParameterResolver
      Parameters:
      parameterContext - The context of the parameter to resolve.
      extensionContext - The context of the test execution.
      Returns:
      true if the parameter is annotated with @Craft, otherwise false.
      Throws:
      org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.ParameterResolutionException - If an error occurs while resolving the parameter.

    • resolveParameter

      public Object resolveParameter(org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.ParameterContext parameterContext, org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.ExtensionContext extensionContext) throws org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.ParameterResolutionException
      Resolves and injects the required test data for parameters annotated with @Craft.

      The method identifies the expected data model, retrieves or generates the corresponding instance, and injects it into the test method. If the model is wrapped in a Late instance, it will be initialized lazily.

      Specified by:
      resolveParameter in interface org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.ParameterResolver
      Parameters:
      parameterContext - The context of the parameter to resolve.
      extensionContext - The context of the test execution.
      Returns:
      The resolved parameter object.
      Throws:
      org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.ParameterResolutionException - If the required data model cannot be instantiated.
